info.name: Neopets Steven Universe Theme
info.description: Join the Crystal Gems in their fight against the Homeworld with this custom Steven Universe Neopets theme.
info.additionalInfo: Updates 9/21/15 - Got rid of annoying new bottom ad 8/25/15 - Slightly altered domain to fix conflict issue with certain pages. 8/24/15 - Crewniverse (episode title cards) navigation font!
